message.body: Hey silly, you left so fast yesterday you didn't give me a chance to say thanks properly--my hotel had a false fire alarm evacuation at 4:00 am so I was really out of it! Anyways, don't feel bad about kids not going to bed on time. I should have known that. Is really hard, even I have the hardest time w that. I was more concerned about Lucas coming in and out of the house by himself on Sat. Anyways, they clearly love you. So thanks! Ps: do u know what happened in Maya's rug? It has several stains...
I don't think we played much on Maya's rug
Yeah I know! I was upstairs w maya watching tv and napping and didn't hear the doorbell ring and def didn't hear him leave. I asked him to pls never do that again, bc it scared me

Lol they love me because I am a total pushover. If you ever need a free moment though and want to drop Lucas off at the gallery for a bit, let me know. I always wish he and I had more time to hang out as friends but maya is quite demanding with attention. I always feel like I'm neglecting him (attention-wise) which is why I also apologized to Him about the fact that I didn't hear the doorbell from upstairs

Actually, I barely heard the doorbell a few days later either, when I was very attentively Waiting for it bc I knew Lucas was returning. I think I let maya put the volume for strawberry shortcake too loud maybe..lesson learned.
He loves u. We will figure something out. We r in Brooklyn w friends. Hanging out in lovely house. :)
I love him too. He really, really reminds me of myself at that age.
